TEXT.TITLE: NATIONAL FUEL GAS CO <NFG> INCREASES DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Qtrly 57 cts vs 30 cts Pay July 15 Record June 30 NOTE: recent dividend based two-for-one stock split effected Wednesday, June 17. Based on pre-split shares the dividend would have been 60 cts. Reuter
